docs.snippet: The U.S. State Department will allow people with valid visas into the United States, a department official said on Saturday, in order to comply with an opinion from a federal judge in Seattle barring President Donald Trump's executive action....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department will allow people with valid visas into the United States, a department official said on Saturday, in order to comply with an opinion from a federal judge in Seattle barring President Donald Trump's executive action.

headline.main: State Department Reverses Visa Ban, Allows Travelers With Visas Into U.S.: Official
headline.print_headline: State Department Reverses Visa Ban, Allows Travelers With Visas Into U.S.: Official

docs.snippet: Avram Grant will leave his post as Ghana coach after Saturday’s African Nations Cup third place playoff match against Burkina Faso, officials said.    Grant’s two-year contract will not be renewed and the search is on for a successor, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Avram Grant will leave his post as Ghana coach after Saturday’s African Nations Cup third place playoff match against Burkina Faso, officials said.    Grant’s two-year contract will not be renewed and the search is on for a successor, senior Ghana Football Association officials told Reuters.

headline.main: Grant to Leave Ghana Job After Nations Cup
headline.print_headline: Grant to Leave Ghana Job After Nations Cup
